com.calendarfx.view

Class VirtualGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.calendarfx.view.VirtualGrid

  • public class VirtualGrid
extends Object
    A virtual grid used to make entries snap to virtual grid lines while being edited.
    See Also:
    DateControl.setVirtualGrid(VirtualGrid)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static VirtualGrid OFF
      The virtual grid in DateControl can never be null, hence we need a virtual grid that does nothing, the OFF grid.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VirtualGrid(String name, String shortName, ChronoUnit unit, int amount)
      Constructs a new virtual grid.

    • Method Summary

      Adjusts the given instant either rounding it up or down.
      LocalDateTime adjustTime(LocalDateTime time, boolean roundUp, DayOfWeek firstDayOfWeek)
      Adjusts the given time either rounding it up or down.
      ZonedDateTime adjustTime(ZonedDateTime time, boolean roundUp, DayOfWeek firstDayOfWeek)
      Adjusts the given time either rounding it up or down.
      int getAmount()
      The number of units used for the grid.
      String getName()
      Returns the grid name that can be used for grid selection controls.

      Returns the grid short name that can be used for grid selection controls.

    • Field Detail

      • OFF

        public static final VirtualGrid OFF
        The virtual grid in DateControl can never be null, hence we need a virtual grid that does nothing, the OFF grid.
        See Also:
        DateControl.setVirtualGrid(VirtualGrid)

    • Constructor Detail

      • VirtualGrid

        public VirtualGrid(String name,
                   String shortName,
                   ChronoUnit unit,
                   int amount)
        Constructs a new virtual grid.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the grid (e.g. "15 Minutes")
        shortName - the short name of the grid (e.g. "15 Min.")
        unit - the time unit of the grid (seconds, minutes, hours)
        amount - the amount of the unit (5, 10, 15 minutes)

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public final String getName()
        Returns the grid name that can be used for grid selection controls.
        Returns:
        the name of the grid settings

        Returns the grid short name that can be used for grid selection controls.

        public final ChronoUnit getUnit()
        The temporal unit used for the grid.

                                DayOfWeek firstDayOfWeek)
        Adjusts the given time either rounding it up or down.
        Parameters:
        time - the time to adjust
        roundUp - the rounding direction
        firstDayOfWeek - the first day of the week (needed for rounding weeks)
        Returns:
        the adjusted time

        Parameters:
